main event: A large, solid object was detected on ground radar in Laconia, New Hampshire in September 1957.
interesting points: The object was detected on radar for about 30 minutes.
The object was moving up and down and side to side during the observation.
The object disappeared from the radar scopes after about 2 minutes.
The object was estimated to be 1-2 miles in diameter.
The object was reported as moving very rapidly.
sighted object: large, solid object detected on ground radar
